name: Ninja Stealth 3
description: After a long vacation our ninja is a little rusty, can you help him with his training? Ninja Stealth III brings you 30 new challenging levels, are you ready?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities Storage: 500 MB available space
